name: Space Tracer (GBrackpool) (GBrackpool)
description:
The game is best played on mobile devices and is available on the Google Play store for free.

You were a trader who did freelance deliveries to different space stations and planets. On deliveries you ran into trouble on your way to your destination as others tried to steal the vital goods and supplies you delivered. Now you have decided to fight back and make the galaxy a safer place. Your ship is very basic so be sure to pick up different items and powerups to help you survive engaging with various enemies in the galaxy...

With up to 20 unique waves and a boss ship every 5 waves you must dodge enemy lasers and bombs and destroy as many ships as possible to rack up big high scores! My biggest high score is around 17,000 so be sure to comment your best high scores if you beat it!
